description:
The following code should be reporting the Progress and Total steps for the current spawn operation.

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py#L141
(bump_progress() in make_step_decorator())

However, this is not making its way into the notification payload.

It's not due to the "allowed updates" check
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/conductor/manager.py#L90
since we are getting the notification.

It actually looks like the updates are simply being ignored for the notification. 

Interesting that no test has found this.
title: XenAPI driver not reporting progress in notifications

comments.content:
The following code should be reporting the Progress and Total steps for the current spawn operation. 

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py#L141
(bump_progress() in make_step_decorator())

However, this is not making its way into the notification payload. 

I suspect this is due to the "allowed updates" check
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/conductor/manager.py#L90
(although "progress" is in the list)

Interesting that no test has found this.
